title: 11,518 Delicious Typographic Images
content:
The [Flickr Typophile Group](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430044930/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/typophile/pool/page1/) holds 11,518 delicious typographic images for consumption. Each lovingly tagged and submitted by 2,385 type lovers worldwide.

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430044930im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typ_flickr_pool_5672.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430044930/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/typophile/pool/page1/)
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: Fantastic collection! Thanks to the team who put this all together.
